sen.j: 松平 忠俊（まつだいら ただとし、生年不明 - 正保2年12月13日 (旧暦)（1646年1月29日））は、江戸時代の人物。
sen.e: Tadatoshi MATSUDAIRA (year of birth unknown - January 29, 1646) was active in the Edo period.

sen.j: 丹波国丹波亀山藩の嫡子。
sen.e: He was the heir of Tanba-Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 藤井松平家の松平忠晴の長男。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Tadaharu MATSUDAIRA of the Fujii-Matsudaira family.

sen.j: 母は正室で杉原長房の娘（浅野長晟の養女）。
sen.e: His mother, a daughter of Nagafusa SUGIHARA (an adopted daughter of Nagaakira ASANO), was a lawful wife.

sen.j: 寛永13年（1636年）、徳川家光に初見するが正保2年（1645年）に早世した。
sen.e: In 1636, he met with Iemitsu TOKUGAWA for the first time; however he died at an early age in 1645.

sen.j: 代わって、藤井松平の宗家・山城守家から従兄弟の松平忠栄 (亀山藩嫡子)が養子として父の後継に望まれた。
sen.e: Instead of him, his cousin Tadahide MATSUDAIRA from the head family of Fujii-Matsudaira, the family of Yamashiro no kami (Governor of Yamashiro Province), was asked to become an adopted child as successor (the heir of the Kameyama Domain).

sen.e: However, as Tadatoshi's younger paternal half-brother was born, Tadahide was sent back to his parents' home later.
